jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
A deadite jumps out of the water behind Ash
A deadite comes out of the wall
Ash shoots Arthur’s sword out of his hand
A woman turns around to reveal she is a deadite
The deadite woman suddenly jumps up
The Necronomicon bites Ash as he reaches out to pick it up
Ash fires his shotgun
Possessed Sheila jumps on Ash
Samuel jumps out and grabs his daughter (as a joke)
A sudden cut to Samuel banging on a car wheel with a tire iron may startle some viewers
A broken doll falls to the ground
Samuel grabs Janice’s hand as she goes to open a door
A shutter slides back up startling Sister Charlotte
Linda sees the doll which, accompanied by a loud noise, suddenly disappears into the darkness
The demon suddenly appears inside the tent and puts her hand on the face of one of the girls
The girl at the window turns around to reveal a demonic face
After several seconds silence, Janice is suddenly pulled off her chair into the air by an unseen force
Janice falls back to the ground
The toy gun is suddenly pulled out of Linda’s hand
Janice’s wheelchair is hit by an unseen force
Janice’s wheelchair is flung away from Janice’s outstretched hand
Bee suddenly begins crawling towards Janice
Hands come out of the well and pull Linda into it
Linda is suddenly pulled across the ground
After the scarecrow disappears, Kate suddenly bangs on the truck door scaring the girls inside
There is a loud bang on the door as Linda tries to open the window
After several seconds of silence, a hand comes from off screen to break the lightbulb beside Carol
There are several loud bangs on the door
Esther’s torso suddenly comes to life and chases after Linda
Janice suddenly bursts into the room where Linda is hiding
Annabelle suddenly appears at the door to her parents bedroom
A man walks into a coffee shop and unexpectedly shoots a customer
During a quiet scene there is suddenly a sound of glass shattering and a cut to the sound waking Luke up
Luke slowly moves towards a seemingly passed out Daniel, who suddenly bites at him
Doctor Braun calls out to Daniel, followed by a cut to Daniel standing right beside his ear and speaking which frightens him
While Luke is walking through a hallway, there is a sudden cut to a deformed face zooming towards the camera while roaring
The deformed man runs at Luke while screaming
A bear roars suddenly
A woman’s face flashes in front of Sarchie’s view from night vision goggles
A cat meows unexpectedly
A mousetrap snaps shut
A dead body falls out of the wall behind Sarchie
Dog begins to bark as a police team enter a bedroom
A bloodied head pops up on security camera footage
A man jumps out and grabs Sarchie from behind
Sarchie sees bloodied head man climbing over his daughters bed in the mirror
A hooded man appears in elevator
The hooded man is shown above Sarchie crawling along pipes
A man jumps out of a chest and puts Sarchie in a headlock
A clown pops out of a jack in the box
A dead body lands on Sarchie’s windscreen
Santino hisses at Sarchie
Santino’s head snaps back during the exorcism
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
A dog barks during a tense scene
Zach, who appears to be asleep, suddenly jumps out of bed to scare Sam
During what appears to be some sort of ritual, there is a sudden bright light accompanied by a high pitched noise
Sam grabs Zach’s wrist
There is a sudden cut to a dog barking
The sound of a door being pushed open during a tense scene may startle some viewers
Sam suddenly appears in front of the camera screaming “get out”. [Video]
Father Thomas suddenly yells at Zach
A girl is pulled into the air by a supernatural force
Sam screams and the door slams shut. A few seconds later the door is blasted off it’s hinges
Sam screams and the furniture lifts off the ground
Sam screams once more and the pictures on the wall fly into the opposite wall
Sam tilts her neck causing Zach to go flying backwards
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
Lucy’s daughter appears in a dream and doesn’t appear to be human
Adrian startles Lucy while she snoops around his office
A bird flies into the window of Charlie’s classroom however we see the bird flying towards the window beforehand which substantially reduces the impact
We see a decapitated head on the road crawling with ants (not a jump scare but some viewers might find the image disturbing)
As Annie drives home from the seance she is startled by the tongue-clicking noise that her daughter makes
After the seance at home, Peter starts to freak out however this is interrupted when a glass cabinet suddenly breaks
Shortly after Annie says “Charlie, what’s wrong?” the candle on the table flares up
Peter thinks he sees Charlie in the corner of the room but it turns out to be a ball that drops and rolls across the floor. After a short pause, an arm suddenly grabs Peter around the head
Peter hears a loud noise from upstairs

During a very tense scene, Peter sees a naked man in the doorway. He then looks up to the ceiling where Annie previously was but no one is there. Suddenly, Annie rushes at him from the corner of the room
Lauren grabs Michael from behind
Someone whispers “Lauren” and then Eric is seen going into the ceiling
Several more possessed people are seen outside the window
She is surrounded by possessed people
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
Needy suddenly appears at Jennifer’s window
Needy turns around and sees a bloodied Jennifer standing right behind her
A crow caws and flies away as Colin climbs some stairs
Jennifer suddenly lands on top of Needy’s car
Jennifer appears in front of Chip
Needy bursts through Jennifer’s bedroom window
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat
As the camera zooms in on Kristi the power suddenly cuts out
A ball is thrown at the camera
Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool
Leila appears in front of the camera
The bathroom mirror cracks
The dark entity flies at the camera
A figure suddenly rushes at the camera accompanied by a loud noise
Something falls down in front of the camera, startling Emily
Leila suddenly walks in on Ryan and Mike who are looking at camera footage
A Santa toy suddenly turns on
Emma begins talking behind Ryan
Something bangs on the bedroom window
A dark entity bursts through the window behind Emily
Leila suddenly attacks Father Todd
The dark entity rushes past the camera
A toy turns on
The entity whooshes past the camera
An abrupt camera change may startle some viewers
The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
Kid sees silhouette through the eye-hole of the Ouija set
The gas element suddenly lights itself
Pete jumps out as the group goes exploring through the house
Pete sees a figure in the mirror and is suddenly pushed against it
On a car window the words “Hi Friend” are written in dust  all of a sudden a hand slams against the window from the inside
Something slams against the door as the girls are listening against it
The chair slides along the ground and all of a sudden a piece of the Ouija board moves
Laine looks through the piece of the Ouija set and sees a being with a stitched mouth
Laine looks through the Ouija piece again and sees a demonic figure running towards her. [Video]
Laine sees a doll, the torch suddenly moves by itself and reveals a silhouette stepping out across the other side of the attic
Trevor gets grabbed by something
A lady appears behind Laine
Debbie morphs into a demonic girl then screams
Trevor walks towards the pool and spins around to see a screaming decomposed face  he is then thrown back into the pool. [Video]
Laine spins Trevor around to reveal that he has no eyes and his mouth is sewn shut
Sarah is grabbed and pulled into a hole in the wall
The silhouette figure suddenly bursts through the curtain
Ellie’s mom bursts into the room causing the group to scream
The sheets are suddenly ripped off Lina’s bed
Doris suddenly sits up in bed
A hand appears as Doris looks through the Ouija planchette
Doris looks through the planchette once more and sees a figure move away accompanied by a loud noise
Doris looks at a mirror though the planchette and sees a demon standing with her. [Video]
Doris is suddenly beside Lina’s bed
There is a sudden cut to Doris with white eyes and an unnaturally wide mouth
Doris suddenly appears beside Mikey
Mikey’s body suddenly drops down from a noose. [Video]
The lights turn off
Doris suddenly glides towards Father Tom
Father Tom looks up and sees Doris on the ceiling
Alice is pushed back by an unseen force as Mikey drops down to grab Lina. [Video]
Doris begins talking from directly behind Alice
Alice looks up as she is being dragged away and sees Doris
Lina knocks Doris away with a chair
Griffin goes to open a cupboard door when Eric puts his hand on the other door-knob, startling Griffin
Griffin pulls at something in his wardrobe which causes a toy clown and assorted old junk to fall down
A squirrel crawls out of the wall in front of Griffin and Eric
A toy keyboard turns on by itself
A hand from the inside the TV touches Maddie’s hand
Griffin’s comic books have been mysteriously stacked up in a triangular shape
There is a loud thunder clap

A hand forms out of the mud and grabs Kendra
The clown suddenly moves onto the floor in front of Griffin
The squirrel jumps at the bars of the cage

A tree branch grabs Griffin as he runs down the stairs
A hand appears and drags Madison away
A chair suddenly flies into the wall
Amy touches Eric on the shoulder
Boyd begins to drill a hole through the closet but his hand is suddenly pulled through the hole
Boyd’s hand is repeatedly pulled into the hole by an unseen force

A spirit, standing behind Maddie, hits the camera
Maddie is suddenly pulled up the stairs

A table suddenly moves, startling Susan
A jet of liquid escapes the cylinder and covers Susan’s face
A jet of liquid suddenly comes out of Susan’s mouth and lands on Lisa
Lisa attacks Calder
A man’s hand comes out from behind the door and tries to grab Brian

Brian has the recurring dream however Catherine is now in the place of the dark figure. After appearing to wake up he turns over in bed and briefly sees Catherine’s bloodied face before waking up for real. [Video]
Two of Holt’s friends sneak up on him and scare him as he talks on his webcam to Julia
During a nightmare, an arm reaches out and grabs Julia around the mouth
The camera suddenly zooms in on Samara’s face before cutting to Skye’s transformed face
Julia looks through a keyhole and briefly sees Samara
Skye’s head suddenly rolls back in the chair, revealing her grotesque face to Julia
Julia runs into Holt as she goes through a door
There is a loud bang on a door
A bird hits the car windscreen
A truck almost runs over Julia

There is a loud bang from behind Julia
Samara appears behind Julia
Holt grabs Julia and pulls her away
A dog starts to bark
A snake slithers past Julia
There are several loud bangs on a door over the next 20 seconds or so
Julia turns the torch on to reveal a young woman running at her while screaming “the child”
Samara appears in the reflection of the mirror
A closeup of Burke’s grotesque face may be startling to some viewers
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home

The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice
Janet starts talking again and is revealed to be standing directly in front of Margaret’s bed
A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]
A telephone rings during a quiet scene
Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor
A man yells and the bed sheets are pulled off Janet’s bed
The bedside cabinet suddenly slides across the room
A tape player suddenly turns on during a tense scene
After putting her hands around the painting the nun suddenly runs at Lorraine. [Video]
Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]
Through an opening in the door Peggy sees Janet be pulled away and replaced with Bill
Peggy looks down and sees Bill’s face in the water. He reaches out and grabs Peggy’s arm
Janet reappears in the kitchen holding a knife
The nun puts her hand on Bill’s shoulder. [Video]
Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him

The door to the girl’s bedroom slams shut

Hands clap behind Carolyn while she is in the basement
A monster appears on the top of the girl’s closet
A sheet blows off the washing line and catches around a figure

Lorraine pulls away the music box revealing an old lady behind it
Legs fall down from the side of the table as Lorraine looks out from underneath
Nancy’s hair gets pulled upwards
One of the children gets pulled in their bed
An old woman appears from under the sheets

A demon grabs  Chris’s leg from under the toilet stall

The scene abruptly cuts to Regan screaming

Regan sits up in bed and attacks Father Karras from behind

Damien yells NO! at Kinderman

The wind blows the window shut

There is a scream and the camera suddenly zooms in on a statue
After the ectoplasm envelops the jar, it disappears in a crack, startling Mrs. Barrett and Ms. Tanner
Dr. Barrett’s teacup shatters in his hand
Mr. Fischer jerks up and starts to scream directly at the camera
Ms. Tanner comes across the black cat’s mangled body in the shower, accompanied with a loud sound effect

The crucifix falls on Ms. Tanner, critically injuring her
Mr. Barrett’s equipment suddenly blows up in his face, injuring him
The stained glass window shatters after a long closeup on Mr. Fischer’s face

The nun on the ground is pulled away into the darkness
The corpse of the nun hanging from the rope suddenly drops to the ground as a group of ravens fly away
The camera pans around Frenchie several times before a nun corpse drops from a tree knocking him to the ground
After watching a shadowy figure move across the room, Irene looks up at the statue of Jesus when Valek suddenly appears behind Irene’s shoulders and glass shatters over her
Shortly after lighting a match in the coffin, Burke hears some noises and Valek’s hands suddenly grab him and pull him down
A nun grabs Irene by the hand as she approaches the praying nuns
After Burke touches the veil of the abbess, she suddenly turns to reveal she has been possessed by Valek
After Irene picks up a bead from the floor, a nun is standing directly behind her
As Irene looks at the rosary, Valek’s hands break through the wall behind her
As a screaming Irene flees, a hand is placed over her mouth by one of the nuns
As Burke walks towards the exorcised boy, Valek suddenly appears
We see a top down shot of the nuns praying together in a circular pattern. The scene briefly goes quiet before an unseen force flings the nuns across the room
After Burke investigates the ringing noise, a hand reaches out of the ground in front of him
After Irene begins to pray a possessed nun attacks the group
Something roars at Frenchie from the darkness as he walks through the catacombs
A faceless nun appears behind Irene. As she turns around to talk to it another nun appears from the side and attacks her
Frenchie hears a noise as he moves through the group of nuns
There is another slight scare as a nun’s head jerks down behind where Frenchie is standing
As Frenchie approaches Irene she suddenly looks up and roars revealing she has been possessed
The possessed boy from the exorcism drops down behind Burke

Rachel unzips the body bag to reveal Jake’s horribly contorted face
As Rachel zips up the body bag, Samara’s arm suddenly grabs her. [Video

A deer smashes through the car window beside Rachel. [Video

Aidan grabs Rachel’s arm
As Rachel goes to open a door, it is suddenly opened on the other side
Aidan comes up behind Rachel and hugs her
Max slumps back in the drivers seat to reveal a horribly contorted face
Samara surfaces from the well once more
A previously quiet scene is interrupted by high pitched static
A man wearing a scary mask appears in front of the camera (accompanied by a sound effect)
Michael suddenly jolts awake
The medium suddenly grabs Michael and there is a burst of static
Michael suddenly screams as the footage distorts and we get another burst of static
The footage cuts to a close up of a stereo accompanied by a loud static noise
During Michael’s hypnotism, everything goes quiet briefly before Michael suddenly appears standing directly in front of the camera
A bird flies into the window
Ellie’s toy makes a noise from behind Michael
A trashcan falls over making a loud noise
Michael in the television footage suddenly turns and looks at the real Michael and once again this is accompanied by a static sound effect
Michael opens a drawer to reveal a bloodied knife and a static sound effect plays once more
Something sparks in the background after Michael says “Why are you doing this?
The book Michael is reading from is suddenly thrown away by an unseen force
Michael violently spasms several times as he lies handcuffed to the bed
As Michael reaches for the phone of the floor, a bloodied hand hangs down from the ceiling
Michael headbutts the mirror
The plug holding the hairdryer explodes

As Samantha bends down to pick up the coin, a car slams into her
Loud music begins playing as a girl tries to sleep
A chandelier falls from the ceiling
Something appears to fly off the heater in the corner of the room, causing a woman to scream

There is a high pitched noise and the camera falls to the ground

Harry slowly enters Jane’s room and sees her standing in the corner covered in blood
Jane bends backwards and a stream of blood comes out of her mouth
There is a high pitched static sound and the camera wobbles violently

Casey opens the bathroom cabinet and a screaming child is inside. [Video

Casey has a vision of the demonic boy while in a night club. He suddenly moves closer to the camera and screams

During a dream, Casey goes to touch her mom who is hunched over with her face obscured from the camera. She suddenly looks up and screams to reveal a horribly distorted face with a large mouth. [Video
The demonic boy appears behind Sofi who is hiding in a small room. [Video
We see a close up of the boy on Casey’s laptop (accompanied by a sound effect)

As Emma tries to escape, Bobby Ray smashes the car window
Bobby Ray attempts to wrestle a weapon away from his brother, Jimmy, and accidentally slams his head into a coat rack hook on the wall
